name: memsql
description: MemSQL running on Apache Mesos. This framework provides the ability to create and manage a set of MemSQL clusters, each running with the MemSQL Ops management tool.
postInstallNotes:
MemSQL DCOS Service has been successfully installed!

	Documentation: http://docs.memsql.com/latest/
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently in preview. We require a minimum of one node with at least 4 CPUs and 16GB of RAM available for MemSQL.
